summary: This document is a unit case list from 2021, likely from a law enforcement or prosecutorial office, designating grand jury matters related to public corruption. It lists several cases, including those against Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell, as well as the investigation into Epstein's death.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as the defendant in case 20-CR-00330, referenced as 'US v Ghislaine Maxwell'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the defendant in case 2018R01618 ('US v. Jeffrey Epstein') and as the subject of an investigation into his death and an alleged trafficking investigation (19-CR-00490).

events.title: Case List Compilation
events.description: A unit case list is created or updated, designating various grand jury matters for scheduling and tracking.

events.title: Epstein Death Investigation
events.description: Investigation into the suicide of Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and falsification of BOP records by guards.

events.title: Maxwell Prosecution
events.description: Ongoing criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20-CR-00330).

events.title: Epstein Trafficking Investigation
events.description: Investigation regarding alleged trafficking and enticement of minors involving Jeffrey Epstein (19-CR-00490).

keyFacts: The document is a procedural list for scheduling and tracking grand jury matters related to public corruption cases.
It confirms the existence of a specific investigation (19-CR-00830) into Jeffrey Epstein's death at the MCC and alleged falsification of records by Bureau of Prisons guards.
It lists the active criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20-CR-00330).
It references a separate investigation (19-CR-00490) into alleged trafficking and enticement of minors involving Jeffrey Epstein.
The document shows these cases were being managed under a 'Public Corruption' designation as of February 2021.
